Post.content:
.

+----+----------+-------------+------+
|  1 | C2019001 | -0.5L   | 0.5L |
|  2 | C2019002 | -1.5L   | 1.5L |
|  3 | C2019003 | -2L     | 2L   |
+----+----------+-------------+------+

orders

+----+--------------+--------+
| id | order_num    | remark |
+----+--------------+--------+
|  1 | 20190220-001 | NULL   |
|  2 | 20190220-002 | NULL   |
|  3 | 20190220-003 | NULL   |
|  4 | 20190220-004 | NULL   |
|  5 | 20190220-005 | NULL   |
+----+--------------+--------+

order_item

+----+----------+----------+-------------+------+
| id | order_id | good_sku | good_name   | num  |
+----+----------+----------+-------------+------+
|  1 |        1 | C2019001 | -0.5L   |    1 |
|  2 |        1 | C2019002 | -1.5L   |    1 |
|  3 |        2 | C2019001 | -0.5L   |    2 |
|  4 |        2 | C2019002 | -1.5L   |    1 |
|  5 |        3 | C2019001 | -0.5L   |    4 |
|  6 |        3 | C2019002 | -1.5L   |    2 |
|  7 |        3 | C2019003 | -2L     |    1 |
|  8 |        4 | C2019003 | -2L     |    2 |
|  9 |        5 | C2019001 | -0.5L   |    2 |
| 10 |        5 | C2019002 | -1.5L   |    2 |
| 11 |        5 | C2019003 | -2L     |    1 |
+----+----------+----------+-------------+------+

SQL

SELECT
    o.*,
    sum(
        CASE WHEN g.size = '0.5L' THEN
            i.num
        ELSE
            0
        END) AS '0.5L',
    sum(
        CASE WHEN g.size = '1.5L' THEN
            i.num
        ELSE
            0
        END) AS '1.5L',
    sum(
        CASE WHEN g.size = '2L' THEN
            i.num
        ELSE
            0
        END) AS '2L',
    sum(i.num) AS tol_num
FROM
    orders o
    LEFT JOIN order_item i ON o.id = i.order_id
    LEFT JOIN goods g ON i.good_sku = g.good_sku
GROUP BY
    o.id;

|  3 | 20190220-003 | NULL   |    4 |    2 |    1 |       7 |
|  4 | 20190220-004 | NULL   |    0 |    0 |    2 |       2 |
|  5 | 20190220-005 | NULL   |    2 |    2 |    1 |       5 |
